snippet: NEWMAN--Frances Rudolph. Beloved wife of the late George Newman passed away on January 10, 2016. She is survived by her sons Laurence and his wife Luisa Hunnewell and Jerrold and his late wife Nadine Fribourg; sister Joyce Weiskopf; grandchildren Mark, Rosemary, Daniel, Jason and Scott. She was born in 1916 in Montreal, Canada. She received teaching certificates from Macdonald College of McGill University and Sir George Williams; she graduated from Queens University (Canada) and Columbia University Teachers College. She was a teacher and guidance counselor in Montreal and New York City Public Schools for over 40 years. Contributions may be made in her memory to Chautauqua Institution, PO Box 28, Chautauqua, NY 14722. Memorial Service: Plaza Jewish Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave and 91 St, 12pm, on Wednesday, January 13. 1/3
